New Records: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam off Detroit ace Tarik Skubal
Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a grand slam in the fifth inning
Hunter Gaddis struck out Kerry Carpenter to end the sixth inning
Eli Morgan struck out both batters he faced in the seventh inning
Thomas hit an RBI single in the seventh to put the Guardians up by three
Emmanuel Clase threw one 100 mph fastball after another to put the Tigers away
Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians had to take down Skubal, the front-runner for the AL Cy Young Award
The team’s familiar, scrappy style dubbed “Guards Ball,” getting three singles — one an infield roller — to load the bases before Skubal hit Ramírez on the left hand to force in a run
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians could finally exhale and plan for their first ALCS visit since 2016
Skubal lost for the first time since Aug. 2
The Tigers had their unimaginable late-season push end in disappointment
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians are an October surprise
The team has won with timely hitting and a shutdown bullpen all season
The team is going to the ALCS for the first time since 2016
The team is facing the New York Yankees in the ALCS
